title.rendered: Weekly Meal Plan for Sedentary Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 5

content.rendered:
In This Article

  • 1 Breakfast
  • 2 Lunch
  • 3 Snack
  • 4 Dinner

Breakfast

  • 1 large glass Fruit and Almond Smoothie
  • 1 tablespoon soaked Chia Seeds

Lunch

  • 1 portion Salsa Sole
  • 1 bowl Mixed Salad

Snack

  • 1 cup Blackberries
  • 1 cup skimmed milk

Dinner

  • 1 serving Spaghetti with Prawns
  • 1 glass low-sodium Seltzer
